name: Klean Kanteen TKWide Chug Cap
description: Won't leak or spill and turns a TKWide bottle into a high-flow drink system.Made from BPA-free polypropylene and food-grade silicone valve.Stainless steel handle.Threaded lid with a quick-cover spout.Fits Kleen Kanteen wide-mouth bottles with a 76.2mm (3 inch) opening.Safe for hot or cold beverages.Dishwasher safe.
